reviews.text: Mr. Handyman of Burleson, Midlothian and E Cleburne Mr. Handyman of Burleson, Midlothian and E Cleburne Handyman/Handywoman/Handyperson 5001 FM1187 STE 290, Burleson, TX 76028 Confirmed by this business 5 weeks ago Is your garage in need of a little TLC? Let Mr. Handyman of Burleson, Midlothian, and E Cleburne take care of it! 🏠🔨 Our expert team specializes in ceiling drywall repair, so you can say goodbye to those unsightly cracks and dents. Whether it's from wear and tear or accidental damage,
Mr Handyman work vans look nice and professional, but Burleson franchise struggle with professional employment management.
Reviews are automatically processed to detect inappropriate content like fake reviews and spam. We may take down reviews that are flagged in order to comply with Google policies or legal obligations.
"Wonderful staff, quick service, and great pricing!" "Floors look great and from time I called till they finish the nicest people."

I proceeded with this company due to their overall ratings score and personal experiences with the contractors. I decided to hire them for my lack of time and for the convenience to sand and seal a 10x12 wood shed. The contractor Mark was … More

I hired HandyMan to hang some really heavy mirrors and I’m so glad I did! The tech, Mark Samek was outstanding! He was punctual, professional, and proficient. The work was great! The price was great! 5 star experience. Thank you HandyMan of Burleson! I will definitely use your services again. More

I needed some work done for our patio. Our builder didn't properly install the posts we had and was taking in water and starting to rot out. The team came out, assessed the work, received a quote There was the need for cost strategies that … More Response from the owner 3 months ago Thank you John for taking the time to share your experience! We’re so glad our team could help repair your patio posts and provide solutions that worked for your budget. Knowing that your home is safe and sound again
